item.description: Fernando Barbosa is a SRE at QuintoAndar. If he would get his way, he would spend his whole day optimizing Dockerfiles. He enjoys talking about containers, Go, Kubernetes, AWS and Observability. Previously a developer, he got frustrated with how difficult it was to get code into production and decided to study about continuous delivery. That is when he learned about DevOps! He eventually fixed the release pipeline, but now he is doomed to spend the rest of his days writing YAML.

item.title: Talks
item.description: In 2020 I presented Projecting Disposable Containers: How to Handle Signals in Docker and Kubernetes! at TDCOnline Especial BH. Slides and code available online [pt]. Also in 2020 I presented Securing Databases using Vault at Cloud Native São Paulo #15 meetup. I have presented What the Helm!? at DevOpsDays 2019 Florianópolis. I have presented What the heck is a Kubernete? at USPCodeLab Summer School 2019. I have made several presentations about CI/CD with Docker using Drone.
